casebody.data:
Randall COLE
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY No. 182P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Ms. Tamika L. Henderson, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department Of Public Safety. Mr. John C. Hunter, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Randall Cole.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of June 2017 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
